channel.title: java on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in java on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: maven 修改版本信息 包括子模块的版本信息
item.description: 执行命令: mvn versions:set -DoldVersion=* -DnewVersion=1.0.1-SNAPSHOT -DprocessAllModules=true -DallowSnapshots=true 执行编译打包的命令: mvn clean install -DskipTests 查看依赖树的版本是否修改成功: mvn dependency:tree -Dverboss -Dincludes=${project.groupId}:${project.artifactId} 失败退回命令: mvn versions:revert ,成功提交命令: mvn versions:commit
